email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. Laycan is 15-20 Oct. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The vessel specs look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Can you come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your quick response. I can offer $51.00 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 Oct and the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Also, please send over the full charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, laycan is confirmed as 15-20 Oct, and demurrage at $20,000 per day. I’ll send over the charter party shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
